data.title: Sinclair Group Acquires Stratstone Land Rover Swansea Dealership
data.meta_description: The Sinclair Group has recently acquired the former Stratstone Land Rover dealership located at Valley Way on the Swansea Enterprise Park.
data.text:
The recent acquisition of the former Stratstone Land Rover site located at Valley Way on the Swansea Enterprise Park means that the family-run Sinclair Group now represents eight automotive marques and employs more than 1,000 people in Wales. Swansea is already home to Sinclair dealerships representing Audi, Mercedes-Benz, SEAT, Skoda, smart, Volkswagen Cars & Volkswagen Light Commercial Vehicles, and this is the latest acquisition by the Sinclair Group in just a matter of months, following its recent purchase of Likes Land Rover in Hay-on-Wye. Furthermore, Sinclair Land Rover has stated that all 65 members of staff previously employed by Stratstone Land Rover will be welcomed into the Sinclair Group.

Formally Stratstone Land Rover

The opportunity to acquire Stratstone Land Rover fitted perfectly with the automotive groups ongoing expansion plan explained Andy Sinclair, Sinclair Group Managing Director. “The Land Rover and Jaguar operations have been trading on Swansea Enterprise Park for 27 and 12 years respectively so both are extremely well-established at this location and we’re extremely proud to welcome them into the Group.” The Sinclair Group have built a strong reputation across Wales by delivering the highest standards of personal service to Welsh motorists, and now look forward to extending that unrivalled retail experience to former Stratstone Land Rover customers and new Sinclair Land Rover customers alike.

Land Rover Swansea Dealership History

The Land Rover Swansea dealership was first acquired by Pendragon in 1990 and was relocated to its present location on the Swansea Enterprise Park in 1992, then known locally as ‘Paramount Land Rover Swansea’. Later renamed ‘Stratstone Land Rover Swansea’ the franchise is now wholly owned and operated by Sinclair Land Rover. The on-site facilities at Sinclair Land Rover Swansea include a fully equipped Service Department with MOT Testing Bays, Air Conditioning Servicing, Tyre Fitting, Four-wheel Alignment, Diagnostic Bays, Valet Servicing, Windscreen Fitting, Land Rover Servicing, Land Rover Parts & Accessories together with New Land Rover & Approved Used Land Rover sales.

Contact Sinclair Land Rover Swansea
